item.title: Fabrice Sindambiwe at Kabiza
item.description:
Fabrice Sindambiwe is currently a Charging Infrastructure intern at Kabiza, an e-mobility company providing electric vehicle services in Africa. Below are the daily tasks Fabrice is involved in:

  • Conducting electric vehicle charger installations, either personally or by coordinating with contractors hired by Kabiza.
  • Performing maintenance and troubleshooting in emergency situations.
  • Addressing customer requests regarding charger malfunctions, faults, or other issues.
  • Conducting site visits to perform feasibility studies for potential charger installations.
  • Converting various types of chargers with different power connectors to the Schuko model, which is common in Africa.
  • Participating in project planning related to Kabizaâ€™s charging activities.
